OrgName.entry: ABBEY GRANGE NURSING HOME - NURSING AND RESIDENTIAL HOME

Desc.entry: Private dual registered care home. 37 beds for people aged 65 years and over suffering from dementia. 50 beds for old age not falling into any other category. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

category.entry: CARE HOMES FOR OLDER PEOPLE (RESIDENTIAL HOMES)
CARE HOMES WITH NURSING FOR OLDER PEOPLE (NURSING HOMES)
